Reviews.Title: Put it back
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: Purchase on Black Friday from Big Lots for Christmas but decided to try it out, and OH boy am I glad I did so that I was able to return it before the return policy for the store was no longer valid.  This camera could not keep up with the functions selected causing it to freeze up and stop working all together. If you take the batteries out and put back in could get it to turn on again. Returned it and bought GE w1000/1200 from Walgreens and it was 5 dollars cheaper, not as pretty - but - OH what a difference! With all the same functions, would recommend the GE for the best buy for an over 10 meg dig camera. Soo glad I opened Polaroid camera this early to test out. I would actually give it a 0 but don't think you can.

Reviews.Title: Crack prices!
Reviews.Author: Will and/or Caroline C.
Reviews.Content: My wife has this camera and it is amazing! I don't know what happened to the guy who gave it a 1 star review maybe he just got a defective camera or something because we've yet to have anything like that happen.The $130 price tag here on amazon is ludicrous though, my wife got hers at a physical store for $55 on sale, and it was only originally marked for $69.99.I downloaded the "invisible hand" add-on for my Firefox browser (really helpful by the way) at right now it's about to have a stroke trying to get me to go to another site for this item for almost $54 cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Cates
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from Big Lots, I love it. It takes wonderful pictures and is easy to use. I have had no problem what so ever out of it. The software is a breeze. I would recommend it! GREAT CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: Polaroid Digital Camera purchased through Amazon
Reviews.Author: Bill Lindsay
Reviews.Content: Camera is very user friendly. Easy to carry. Pictures are sharp. Like this camera very much.

Reviews.Title: Good cheap camera- works perfect!
Reviews.Author: Alison "Picture this"
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this camera yesterday, 49.99 at Big Lots (AND, it was NOT a Refurb!).  For my needs, it's useful to keep a cheap camera with me for work and other things.Alright, I have a couple other cameras of better quality, like a Sony DSC-W150 and a Pentax SLR.  This isn't the greatest, but I didn't want something that if it broke, stopped working, or got stolen, I would cry over it.  It's small, it's cheap (on top of the 49.99, I had a 20 percent off coupon, so it was even less expensive!) and it does the job, so far.  Picture quality is decent.  Ok, one complaint I have is that it doesn't always start up when I press the power button.  I don't know if it's the narrow design of the switch vs. my stubby fingers (pressing it a second time gets it).  The second is the small black plastic cover on the USB connector doesn't seem to stay on and is loose.  Aesthetics.  Anyway, I put a 8gb Sd card in, and I'm ready to go.  I did not choose the camera for the no. of megapixels.  The only time you need to care about megapixels is if you were going to blow the picture up beyond poster size.  If I just need a camera to take a picture of a label on a machine, or the cute puppy and email it to someone, this will do.I'm only giving it 4 stars because I don't know how long it's going to last.  Overall, it seems pretty sturdy, but I said the same thing last year about a refurbished Sony DSC-S930 that died on me after 6 months.  I'll follow up later..

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Mary La Tour
Reviews.Content: The item that I ordered was to replace one that met a very unfortunate end. Plainly, it is just a replacement and both were based on price and the low level of quality that was needed for it use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera no idea why all the bad reviews
Reviews.Author: Randall D. Lind
Reviews.Content: This camera works great and the seller I got it from sold me a red one and I love it. My last camera was an Polaroid i737 7MP one so I brought this one base on that. The buttons are different and the menu is more tricky to learn but, all in all it is a great camera.Also the camera is very and I mean very light weight even with batteries and 2GB SD card.

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera ever!
Reviews.Author: bringslite
Reviews.Content: This a cheap camera. Very slow and you end up missing good shots if you try to shoot continuously. Several months and after hardly using it, it started acting up. Playback light flashes, and when pressed, a "bad file" message pops up. It takes picture when it feels like it. I got so fed up with it; I ended up smacking it.Save your money and busy a better camera such as Kodak or Sony.
